body.p: The Gentoo security team is looking for additional members on all levels, reports today's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The graphical installer that debuted on the 2006.0 release now has a new bugzilla subcategory, and Ruby on Rails is in Portage. Two threads from the Gentoo Forums could use your attention, a French movie owes last week's theatrical release to Gentoo Linux, and this GWN also carries the usual GLSA section and bugzilla statistics. Have fun!
